intro_text: As r_c crosses a beach, shivering with the cold, there's a creaking, rushing sound, like a wave - but out of sync with the ocean.
decline_text: r_c decides to head back early.
success_text: r_c leaps forward, dashing to the other side of the beach and up onto the rocks. They make it in time to watch the beach get lost under a tide of water from inland.

s_c scrambles back the way they came and watches the beach disappear under a flood of water. It leaves behind a changed landscape, tons of debris - and a large dead sheep. s_c pounces on the opportunity to scavenge.

s_c shrieks at the strange sound, paws digging into the sand as they turn and run for home. They are proven right when the beach disappears under a flood of water from inland. Their caution saved their life.
fail_text: r_c is in the middle of the beach when the flood hits them, freezing water rushing from inland, sweeping them straight out to sea to die in the cold ocean.
history_text: r_c was swept out to sea by a flood.
were swept out to sea by a flood

intro_text: p_l hears desperate mewling coming from the ocean.
decline_text: Must be my imagination they mutter.
success_text: p_l and the rest of their patrol race towards the section of beach they hear the wailing from. To their absolute horror they see several kits just barely keeping their head above water, the remains of a twoleg thing trapping them into place. p_l and r_c leap into the water and quickly get rid of that blasted twoleg thing, They grab the kits by their scruff and hand the kits over to the rest of the patrol so they can keep them warm until they reach camp.

s_c upon seeing several kits trapped by a twoleg contraption immediately jumps into the cold harsh water of the sea. They use a piece of wood to make a makeshift raft and paddles them back to shore where the rest of the patrol can keep them warm and race them back to camp to be cuddled into the pelts of their loving queens.
fail_text: To the cat's their horror they were too late, the bodies of several kits washing ashore. They mutter a prayer. 'Oh sea, oh ancient ones, please take these bodies and guide them with your gentle waves to rest forevermore in your loving embrace and release their souls into the stars.' Gently picking up the kits they swim out into the cold ocean ensuring their bodies stay beneath the waves.
history_text: this cat got injured from carrying deceased kits to their final resting place in the ocean.
This cat died due to drowning in the sea.
